title: The Widower Ep. 2: 6 Wives, 4 Funerals
description: Detectives investigating a woman’s murder hit the road to learn about her husband’s 5 other marriages and 3 dead wives. They discover he’s been on trial, in a case that resembles their own.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
